title: 103F.715 CLEAN WATER PARTNERSHIP PROGRAM ESTABLISHED.
text: A clean water partnership program is established as provided in sections 103F.701 to 103F.755. The agency shall administer the program in accordance with these sections. The agency shall provide financial and technical assistance in accordance with section 103F.725 to local units of government for projects in geographical areas that contribute to surface water or groundwater flows. The projects shall provide for protection, enhancement, or restoration of surface water and groundwater.
